content.text: 1. Collect Mossberry → Pogo on top of the Mossmir enemy to reach Mossberry → Defeat Moss Mother boss
2. Chapel Maid encounter
3. Continue right to Bone Bottom
1. [Optional] Sherma encounter
2. Continue through the room for Skull Brute Arena Battle
3. Hit the lever to unlock the door to Bone Bottom → Unlock the bench [30 Rosaries]
4. Collect Shard Pendant [1/51]
5. Hit the two levers in the long room for shortcuts → Buy Quill and Compass [2/51] from Shakra (50+70=120 Rosaries)
6. Unlock trapdoor at Mosshome and collect the Choral Commandment → Obtain Silkspear Skill [1/6]

7. Use Silkspear to unlock Druid's home → collect the third Mossberry at the secret room below Moss Druid → Go up again for Moss Druid encounter; Complete Berry picking Wish, Get Druid's eye [3/51] as reward
8. Open the door, buy The Marrow and Mosslands maps (50+40 Rosaries) from Shakra
1. Use Silkspear to free Bell Beast and defeat it for Silk Heart [1/3]; Unlock Marrow Bellway
2. Ring the First Bell
3. Open trapdoor → Get the Craftmetal [1/8] Behind glowing orb secret door
4. Break the door and collect Straight pin [4/51], Grindle encounter
5. Activate the elevator for shortcut → Enter Deep Docks
1. Buy Deep Docks Map (50 Rosaries) from Shakra
2. Unlock Deep Docks Bellway (40 Rosaries) → travel to Bone Bottom and accept all wishes at the Objective Board and complete Bone Bottom Repairs wish
3. Rescue Lost Flea [1/30] behind breakable wall
4. Get bench (30 Rosaries) → Complete Skarr Arena Battle
5. Obtain Swift Step [1/6]
6. Get Lost Flea [2/30] → after flicking a lever, open the gate to the bench (30 Rosaries)
1. Obtain Spool Fragment [1/18] at lava-filled room
2. Complete the Arena Battle → Buy Magma Bell [5/51] from the Forge daughter (110 Rosaries + craftmetal)
3. Lace boss fight
4. Ring Second Bell and enter Far Fields
1. Rescue Lost Flea [3/30] behind breakable wall
2. Hit glowing orb for access to lower part of the room → Unlock Bench and Far Fields Bellway (30+50 Rosaries)
3. Buy the Far Fields map from Shakra (50 Rosaries)
4. Get Warding Bell [6/51] → Get craftmetal [2/8] from the chest at the end of room
5. Seamstress encounter; Accept Flexile Spines wish
1. Break fallen spikes from Honker enemies in the room at the right (they respawn after reentering the room) → Collect Bone scroll → Return to Seamstress and obtain Drifter's Cloak as reward
2. Use Drifter's Cloak to reack upper left room; explode glowing orb to reveal Mask shard [1/20]
3. Fourth Chorus boss fight
4. Use Drifter's Cloak to ascend the room; Sherma 2nd encounter (don't enter Mort's shop, we'll come back later)
5. Hit the lever to open the platform, keep ascending until you reach Greymoor
1. Buy the greymoor map from Shakra (70 Rosaries)
2. Enter the craw nest and beat the craw arena; activate the mechanism inside
3. Rescue Lost Flea [4/30]
4. Pick Three Fold Pin [7/51] tool in secret room
5. Get Thread storm skill [2/6]
6. Hit the lever to open the door to the left room → Ring the bell and open the shortcut to the bench
7. Enter secret room and Pick up Bone scroll → Enter Halfway home, Nuu encounter → get Hunter's journal and Bugs of Pharloom wish
1. Arena Battle → Unlock Greymoor Bellway (60 Rosaries)
2. Go to the bottom left room and get Memory Locket [1/20]
3. Garmond and Gaza encounter
4. Proceed to next room and enter the Chapel of the reaper, get Reaper Crest [1/6] after arena battle

5. Hit the lever to unlock the shortcut to Halfway Home; Garmond and Gaza's second encounter (Note: Garmond only appears after discovering Moorwing and reloading the area or dying to the boss. (Optional) Garmond can be asked for assistance in the fight)
6. Break the rope for shortcut → Proceed to Moorwing boss fight
7. Enter Bellheart and unlock the Bellway Station (60 Rosaries)
1. In Bellheart, go to the left and you will arrive at Shellwood → Break Purple nest and get Longpin [8/51]
2. Ascend until you reach the Arena Battle → rest at bench (40 Rosaries)
3. Take the elevator and descend → Press the button to open shortcut → Talk to Greyroot to obtain Rite of the Pollip wish
4. Buy Bellheart and Shellwood maps from Shakra (40 + 70 Rosaries)
5. Rescue Lost Flea [5/30]
6. Unlock Shellwood Bellway Station (40 Rosaries)
7. Get Mask shard after flower jumping challenge [2/20] → (Optional) Quit out to avoid Phacia trap
8. Pogo the flower to reach the first Pollip heart [1/6] → Take the elevator and rest at the bench
1. Sister splinter boss fight
2. get Pollip Heart [2/6] at the left side of the room → Obtain Cling grip [2/6]
3. Collect Pollip Heart [3/6] at top of the room → Break wall to acces te upper part of Bellheart → Free the Lost Flea [6/30] at the top part of the first room

4. Break the wall and return to Shellwood to pick the Pollip Heart [4/6] behind breakable roots → Pick the Pollip Heart [5/6] in the room to the right of the bench room → Pick the last Pollip Heart [6/6] → Return to Greyroot to turn in the Pollip Hearts to obtain Pollip Pouch [9/51]
5. Ring the Bell and rest at the bench
6. Go to the left until you reach the vertical section in Mosslands
1. Little detour to Wormways, pick Dead bug's Purse or Shell Satchel (Steelsoul) [10/51]
2. Buy the Wormways map from Shakra (70 Rosaries)
3. Rescue Lost Flea [7/30] behind breakable wall
4. Pick Mask Shard [3/20] behind breakable wall
5. Run from the Craggler (or fight it) and activate the elevator to Bone Bottom
6. (optional) pick Mossberry from Aknid enemy → obtain Spool Fragment [2/18] behind breakable wall
7. (optional) Pick up Weaver Effigy and Mossberry along the way → open door to Bone Bottom→ Enter the Chapel of the Wanderer and obtain the Crest of the Wanderer [2/6] after Arena Battle

8. Go to Bone Bottom; At the wish board, complete Garb of the Pilgrims wish and A Life Saving Bridge. Accept Volatile Flintbeetles and The Terrible Tyrant wishes; At Pebb shop buy Magnetite Brooch [11/51] and Mask Shard [4/20] (120+300 Rosaries)
1. Enter the Marrow from Bone Bottom and fight the Flintbeetle at the top [1/3] → Continue and fight the Flintbeetle [2/3], rescue the Lost Flea [8/30] next to it,
2. Obtain Memory Locket [2/20] after Arena Battle → Fight the final Flintbeetle [3/3]
3. Jump to reach Arena battle inside Deep Docks and obtain Mask shard [5/20]
4. Climb the wall near the moving platform and fight Skull Tyrant
5. Open the door to the left, go to the Flea Caravan and accept and complete The Lost Fleas wish, travel with them to Greymoor → Talk to Grishkin for Flea Brew [12/51]
1. From the Flea caravan, go to the Bellway station and travel to Bone Bottom → Complete Volatile Flintbeetles to obtain Memory Locket [3/20] and The Terrible Tyrant; Travel back to Bellheart
2. (optional) Go to the right for Bell Hermit encounter after secret passage
3. Access the upper part of Bellheart through Shellwood to access Widow boss fight; After defeating her, obtain Needolin [3/6]; Ring the bell afterwards.

4. Unlock trapdoor and return to Bellheart city, talk to Relic Seeker Scrounge and give him all the acquired relics; talk to Pinmaster Plinney for Pin Upgrade [1/4]; Accept Silver Bells, My Missing Courier and Crawbug Clearing wishes. Complete Silver Bells wish picking up silver bells from the top and bottom sections of Bellheart (Note: Silver Bells spawn randomly, reenter the aereas for new ones to spawn) → Travel to Bone Bottom and buy craftmetal [3/8] and Simple Key from Pebb (60+500 Rosaries) → Return to Bellheart
5. Descend through the lower Bellheart room and enter The Marrow.
1. Accept Loddie challenge near the bench (25 Rosaries for round), win the challenge to obtain Tool Pouch Upgrade [1/4], optional accept second challenge for Heavy Rosary necklace (220 Rosaries)
2. Enter Hunter's March, rescue Lost Flea [9/30] at the top of the first room
3. Continue until you reach the Arena Battle → Rest at the bench (Note: The trap can be deactivated by hitting the lever on the left side of the room)
4. (optional) Gilly encounter
5. (optional) Arena battle for 375 Rosaries
6. (optional) If in Steel mode buy Fractured Mask from Mottled Skarr (260 Rosaries), it will ease things a bit
7. Buy the Hunter's March map from Shakra (70 Rosaries)
8. Pick up Memory Locket [4/20]
9. Enter Chapel of the Beast and obtain Crest of the Beast [3/6] after Salvage Beastfly boss fight
10. Buy Sting Shard and Crafting kit Upgrade [1/4] from Forge Daugther (140 Rosaries+ craftmetal, 180 Rosaries)
11. Go to the Deep Docks Bellway station and travel to Shellwood

legs.title: Leg 11 - Weavenest Atla (My Missing Courier wish)

content.text: 1. From shellwood station go left and drop down at mosslands vertical room. Find Tipp, he will then move to Bellheart.
2. Keep descending to Bone Bottom
1. Play the Needolin at the door to access Weavenest Atla
2. Get the Weavenest Atla Map
3. Climb the wall and enter the next room, pick up Rune Harp, complete the platforming challenge to get Mask shard [6/20]
4. Reach the room with a Spool Fragment [3/18]
5. Rest at the bench and use 4 Memory Lockets, open the breakable walls and talk to Eva to get the first upgrade for Hunter's Crest and the Vesticrest for an extra Yellow tool
6. Go to Beone Bottom Bellway Station and travel to Shellwood Station
1. From Shellwood Station go to the left until you reach the Blasted steps area, (optional) Nuu encounter at Splinter Sister boss fight arena, unlock bench at Blasted Steps (60 Rosaries)
2. Continue and fall to the platform containing a Memory Locket [5/20]
3. Buy the Blasted Steps map from Shakra (70 Rosaries)
4. Unlock Blasted steps Bellway and bench (60+40 Rosaries), (optional) Sherma encounter after reloading area
5. Descend to reach secret area with Craftmetal [4/8]

6. Use the Needolin at the Grand Gate and fight the Last Judge → Enter the Citadel and begin Act 2 (Note: The first part of The Citadel is really scarce in rosaries, make sure you have about 300-400 rosaries saved up. It's better to have them saved in rosary strings just in case)
1. Buy the Grand Gate map (40 Rosaries)
2. Hit the bottom of the platforms to reach Spool Fragment at the top [4/18]
3. Use the elevator, drop down and reach the Underworks, pay 15 rosaries for single use bench
4. Collect Underwoks Map and (optional) Bone scroll behind a breakable wall
5. (optional) Loam encounter and rosary farming spot, Unlock Vermania Station (80 Rosaries)
6. Spool fragment [5/18] after Arena Battle
7. Get bench (15 Rosaries for single use), go to the top of the room and find passage to Memory Locket [6/20]
8. Complete Arena Battle → Hit lever to gain acces to lower section → Collect Delvers Drill charm [13/51]
9. Acces Choral Chambers
1. Unlock shortcut to Grand Gate → Unlock path → Buy Choral Chambers map (70 Rosaries)
2. Lace encounter → Open door to unlock shortcut → Unlock Grand Bellway station and Ventrica station (80 + 80 Rosaries)
3. Enter First Shrine and ring the bell
4. Grab White Key at right part of Songclave → Unlock Songclave Ventrica Station (80 Rosaries)
5. Open door for shortcut → Fight Cogwork dancers
1. Enter the room with a bench→ Collectthe Cogwork Core map at the room above the bench
2. Open the two doors in the room for shortcuts → Complete Arena Battle → Open shortcut to Songclave
3. Collect Psalm Cylinder → Unlock Bench at the top of the room→ Vaultkeeper Cardinus encounter
4. Break ceiling to open path to Mask Shard [7/20]
5. Collect Cogheart piece [1/3]
6. Use the moving blocks to reach Lost Flea [10/30]
7. Collect Pale Oil
8. Open shortcut to stage
9. Travel to Bellheart and talk to Pinmaster Plinney to complete Pinmaster's Oil wish, upgrade needle → Get wishes from billboard →Travel to Greymoor Bellway Station
1. Rest at Halfway home --> Get Spool fragment [6/18] → break two walls for shortcut to Sinner's road; Quit out to return to Halfway home

2. At Halfway Home, farm the craws on the ceiling to complete Crawbug Clearing wish and obtain Tool Pounch Update [2/4]; talk to Nuu and complete bugs of Pharloom (if possible) for Crafting Kit Upgrade [2/4]
3. Rescue Lost Flee [11/30
4. Use craftmetal to obtain Pimpillo [14/51]
5. Rescue Kratt [12/30]
6. Enter Sinner's road
1. Use Simple Key to rescue Green Prince
2. Talk to Crull and Benjin and get Roach Guts wish
3. Rescue Pill to complete Missing Brother wish
4. Unlock shortcut to the bench → Buy map from Shaka (90 Rosaries) → Do platform challenge to repair the bench
5. Breakable wall for shortcut to Bilewater → Unlock a bench after defeating two Muckroaches; Styx encounter
6. Rescue Lost Flea [13/30]
7. Get Simple Key after defeating a roachkeeper
8. Breakable wall to open the path to Bilewater
1. Enter room after nnedolin door and interact with the tablet at the end to unlock exit →Get Ruined Tool [15/51]
2. Break wall and rescue Lost Flea [14/30]
3. Unlock bench and Bilewater Bellway Station (60 + 80 Rosaries)

4. Enter The Mist (the order of rooms is random, play the needolin on butterflies groups and they will guide you to the correct exit. At the end of The Mist Area, you will arrive at Exhaust Organ) → Inside the Exhaust Organ, there is a room with a silk refill spindle. Go left from there to rescue Lost Flea [15/30]
5. Defeat the Phantom to obtain Cross Stitch skill [3/6]
6. Jump onto the elevator and enter the Grand Bellway → Get Memory Locket [7/20] behind breakable wall before dropping to Bellway station
1. Defeat Trobbio and obtain Claw Mirror [16/51]
2. Enter the Underworks and obtain the Spool Fragment [7/18] behind the breakable wall
3. Rest at the bench (Note: equip Magma Bell for easier time) → Rescue the Lost Flea [16/30]
4. Obtain Craftmetal [5/8]
5. Obtain Clawline [4/6]
6. Complete arena battle to open shortcut to Twelfth Architect → Go to Whispering Vaults
1. (optional) Play Needolin to interact with Pious Isamor
2. Obtain Sacred Cylinder
3. Talk to Cardinius to learn Vaultkeeper's Melody [1/3]
4. Go to Songclave to collect wishes from the notice board
1. Mask shard [8/20] in Cogwork Core
2. Speak to Loyal Mergwin to receive Great Taste of Pharloom wish
3. Activate fan to rescue Lost Flea [17/30]
4. Rescue another Flea [18/30] at the end of platforming challenge
5. Obtain Cogheart piece after bell puzzle
6. Save Grindle from the Reeds
7. Enter the spa for Sherma encounter
8. Open shortcut to right room → Arena battle → Unlock Choral chambers Ventrica Station (80 Rosaries)
9. (optional) reload the area for Green Prince encounter → Enter the Slab
1. Enter and unlock the bench and the Slab Bellway station
2. Enter Mount Fay and buy the map from Shaka (40 Rosaries)
3. Unlock the bench (60 rosaries) → Get Memory Crystal [17/51] after platforming
4. Climb the wall and rescue Lost Flea [19/30] in secret room
5. Get the bench → keep ascending and obtain Faydown Cloak [4/6] at the top of the mountain

6. Find the bench; (optional) Obtain Silkshot repairing the broken tool (Note: there are three locations to repair the broken tool: At this location, Silkshot (Hornet) is crafted, there's also Silkshot(Forge Daughter) and Silkshot (Twelfth Architect). Everyone is a little different, look up which version is preferred)
7. (optional) Mask Maker encounter
8. DON'T REST AT BENCH → Get Mask Shard [9/20] and quit out to return at the top of the mountain for a safer return.
9. Rescue Lost Flea [20/30] above the Slab Bellway Station Bench → Travel to Bone Bottom
1. Donate 440 Shell Shards to complete Icon of Hope wish, make sure that all Bone Bottom wishes are completed →Use the elevator to reach Wormways
2. Use a simple key to open the locked door
3. Open Needolin door and obtain Sharpdart skill [4/6]
4. Talk to alchemist Zylotol and accept Alchemist's assistant wish; equip Plasmium Phial at bench
5. Use Plasmium Phial to obtain Plasmium [1/3] → Collect Plasmium [2/3] behind breakable wall → Get Memory Locket [8/20]
6. Collect Plasmium [3/3] → Open shortcut to Bonegrave → Return to Zylotol for Plasmium Phial [18/51]
7. Go to Moss Druid to obtain Moss stew for Great Taste of Pharloom wish, turn in mossberries for rosaries

8. (optional) Go back to Bone Bottom and fight the Skull Tyrant (reload area if it doesn't spawn); travel to Bellway station and buy Spool Fragment [8/18] and Memory Locket [9/20]; Travel to Blasted steps

1. Rest at the Station bench, drop down and go to the left to reach the platform below the mask shard. Reaching the platform requires running, clawline, double jump, dash → complete the room and obtain Mask shard [10/20], quit out to return to the station
2. Collect Magnetic Dice [19/51]
3. Great Coachflies boss fight
4. Speak to Pinstress to learn Needle Strike [5/6]
5. Enter Sands of Karak
1. Collect Memory Locket [10/20]
2. Drop stalagmite to open acces to Blasted Steps → Rescue lost Flea [21/30]
3. Buy the Sands of Karak map from Shaka (90 Rosaries)
4. Open breakable walls to collect Crestnut at the end of the room for Great Taste of Pharloom quest
5. Rescue Lost Flea [22/30]
6. Use elevator and open shortcut to Blasted steps → Collect Simple Key
7. Drop the stalegmite to open shortcut → Use Clawline and double jump to acces Voltnest; grab Volt Filament [20/51] after Voltvyrm boss fight
8. Return to Blasted steps station and travel to Greymoor

1. From Greywood station go to Halfway home; Complete Bugs of Pharloom wish for Tool Pouch Upgrade [2/4]; Pay 480 rosaries to access to Vintage Nectar for Great Taste of Pharloom quest; enter basement to collect it, beware of ants; collect Memory locket [11/20] at the right side of Halfway home (requieres Faydown cloak)
2. Get Barbed Bracelet [21/51]
3. Obtain Pickeled Muckmaggot after defeating Disgraced Chef Lugoli, open the right door for a shortcut before the fight.
4. If needed farm muckroaches for Roach Guts wish → Complete Roach Guts wish and obtain Tacks [22/51]
5. open shortcut to Exhaust Organ → From Bilewater Station travel to Bellheart

In Bellheart, talk to the Couriers' brothers to start the delivery of the Couriers' Rasher. (This quest has a timer; when checking the route, make sure to pause the game.) Hits also take one line of the delivery for every mask lost. Falling from great heights and hitting a wall while sprinting also damages the package. Bellway and Ventrica stations will destroy the package

Deliver the 5 ingredients to Loyal Mergwin and complete Great Taste of Pharloom wish to obtain Pale Oil → Return to Bellheart and talk to Pinmaster Plinney for Needle Upgrade [3/4]; Travel to Far Fields
1. Enter the secret passage behind Bellway Station; Rescue Lost Flea [23/30] at the end; open door to Mott Shop
2. At Mott shop, buy Weigthed Belt [23/51], Tool Pouch Upgrade [3/4] and Memory Locket [12/20] (160 + 220 + 150=530 Rosaries)
3. Beat Savage Beastfly for Savage Beastfly wish
4. Enter needolin door and run fast to the end of the room for Silkspeed Anklets [24/51]; (optional) equip Flee Brew and Anklets and run again to unlock a secret room with a Rune Arp
5. Get Mask Shard [11/20]
6. Enter Deep Docks
1. Use Clawline to open the door → explode the glowing orb to enter the secret room with Spool Fragment [9/18]
2. Complete Arena Battle → Rescue Lost Flea [24/30]
3. Hit lever to open top part of room → Get Flintslate [25/51]
4. Fight Signis & Gron; (optional) open door for access to forge daughter bench for easier runback from boss
5. Get Memory Locket behind breakable wall [13/20]
6. (optional) Buy Silkshot from Forge Daugther. At this point, you should decide on which version of the Slinkshot you prefer
7. Get Fractured Mask [26/51] from Mottled Skarr corpse
8. Get Curveclaw [27/51] after really short Arena Battle
9. Return to Deep Docks Bellway Station and go to Bellheart; Turn in Savage Beasfly for Mask Shard [12/20]
1. Travell Back to Bellway Station and use Ventrica to Choral Chambers → Garmond and Zaza encounter → Rescue Jubliana → Use White Key to enter Whiteward

2. Get Choral Commandment → Climb to the top floor, summon the elevator, then quickly slide back down the hole to intermedium level, wait for the elevator to pass and drop down to get Spool Fragment [10/18]
3. Get Whiteward map (70 Rosaries)
4. Injector bend [28/51]
5. Get Surgeons Key

6. Drop down to Underworks and buy Architects Key and Silkshot [29/51] (if not adquired at Mount Fey or Forge Daugther) (130+110=240 Rosaries and 1 craftmetal) → Enter Chapel of the Architect and get Architects Crest [4/6]
7. Use Ventrica Station to the First Shrine
1. Green Prince encounter at Cogworks Dancers arena
2. Solve puzzle Cogheart Piece → Collect Memorium Map (70 Rosaries)
3. (optional) get Mossberry → Open path to the bench → Get Memory Locket [14/20]
4. Break floor for shortcut → Unlock Ventrica Station (80 Rosaries)
5. Get Materium and break wall for Voltvessels [30/51]
1. Free Chonky Lost Flea and fight it [25/30]
2. Get Spool Fragment [11/18]
3. Return to the map room and reach the hidden path to the Putrified ducts the behind breakable wall
1. Unlock bench and Putrified Docks (60 + 80 Rosaries)
2. Get Putrified Ducts Map
3. Get key of the Apostate → Talk to Huntress for Broodfeast Wish*
4. Play needolin on the tablet → Get craftmetal [6/8]
5. Get Wreath of Purity [31/51]
6. Speak to Vog [26/30] then he will move to the caravan
7. Go to Bilewater Bellway Station

*For Broodfeast Wish you need to kill enemies using certain tools:
• Seared Organs: Flintslate, Pimpillo, Voltvessels
• Shredded Organs: Conchcutter, Sawtooth Circlet
• Skewered Organs: Longpin, Sting Shard
